00105 typedef long uint32;
00106 
00107 typedef enum { NOACCESS, READONLY, READWRITE, READCREATE } mib_access; 
00108 
00109 typedef enum { AGENTPP_NONE, AGENTPP_PROXY, AGENTPP_LEAF, AGENTPP_TABLE, 
00110                AGENTPP_GROUP, AGENTPP_COMPLEX, 
00111                AGENTX_NODE, AGENTX_LEAF } mib_type;

00113 #define REMOVE  0x01
00114 #define CREATE  0x02
00115 #define CHANGE  0x04
00116 #define UPDATE  (REMOVE | CREATE | CHANGE)
00117
